amendment.description: Amendment sought to appropriate $18.6 million for operation of the Office of Technology Assessment. \ Amendment, as amended by the Houghton substitute amendment (A006), was subsequently agreed to. See Roll No. 410.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore funding for the Office of Technology Assessment. The amendment would add $18.6 million in funds to continue funding of the office at a level 15% less than current levels.

action.text: On agreeing to the Fazio amendment (A005) as amended Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 214 (Roll No. 405).
